name: com.unity.services.leaderboards
description: Add socio-competitive elements to your game by allowing users to compete on leaderboards. Use the Leaderboards service to store, sort, and rank player scores powered by Unity Gaming Services.

samples.description: Example scripts demonstrating the Leaderboards package.
This is a simple sample to deploy and call a Leaderboard configuration.

_upm.changelog:
### Added

- Adding service registration to the core services registry
- Adding service access through the core services registry  (`UnityServices.Instance.GetLeaderboardsService()`)
- Adding service support for creating leaderboards service instances through `UnityServices.CreateInstance`

### Fixed
- Moved create leaderboard configuration menu item under "Services"
